snippet: The site’s highest price points are rising and it is seeing a rising trend of single-owner sales.
abstract: Graham Bowley Inside Art column: art auction site Paddle8 boasts its highest price points are rising, regularly breaking $100,000, and enjoying upward trend in single-collector sales.
lead_paragraph: The site’s highest price points are rising and it is seeing a rising trend of single-owner sales.

headline.main: Paddle8, Art Auction Site, Sees Growth
